field.name: summary
field.value: Allow components to implement multiple services.

field.name: description
field.value:
When a component is added to the container via XML the service attribute can only appear once. Components may implement multiple services. Currently you need to add a new component node for each service that a type provides:
<component id="productManager.service" service="Company.IProductService, Company" type="Company.ProductManger, Company"> </component>
<component id="productManager.validator" service="Company.IProductValdiator, Company" type="Company.ProductManger, Company"> </component>
The syntax below would allow a component to provide more than one service:
<component id="productManager" type="Company.ProductManager, Company"> <service type="Company.IProductService, Company" /> <service type="Company.IProductValidator, Compay" /> </component>
A similiar result could probably be achieved today using a custom interperter.
